Reviews.Title: new computer
Reviews.Author: jody george
Reviews.Content: this computer far exceeds what I expected, I like the extra mouse button on the keyboard. very sleek looking computer. I would definitely recommend Lenovo. the second numerical keyboard on the right is also a big plus!

Reviews.Title: it is a price reasonable one
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: everything is good. only it's too wide, i don't think people need extra number buttons again. I still like it so much.

Reviews.Title: A Great Touchscreen Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I've tried one or two Window 8 laptops without touchscreen, and the touch interface is definitely the key to a great Windows experience. The laptop read my fingers pretty well and didn't have many misreads. The specs are decent for an overall enjoyable experience. I just wish the screen was a little sturdier, but for the price it was worth it. I might also recommend this add-on: http://amzn.com/B00HIYA3SK/?tag=wwwquickfixau-20

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Lighton
Reviews.Content: This is a very good laptop, excellent considering the price. Turned it on and after filling in some personalization, it started producing right away. It would be a 5 star if it had "Office". But I guess that's just a personal preference.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo Ideapad
Reviews.Author: kenneth l. utter
Reviews.Content: Good little computer for $400.  Nothing fancy, just works as advertised.  Better memory and processor than most others in this price range.
